text: Hay đoc cho ho (nghe) cau chuyen cua Nuh khi Y bao nguoi dan cua Y: "Nay hoi dan ta! Neu cac nguoi cam thay kho chiu ve đia vi cua ta cung nhu viec ta nhac nho cac nguoi ve nhung dau hieu cua Allah thi ta hoan toan pho thac cho Allah. The thi cac nguoi hay cung hop tac voi cac than linh cua cac nguoi ma sap đat cong viec cua cac nguoi roi cho đe cho ke hoach cua cac nguoi co đieu nao so sot roi hay (dung no ma) xu ly ta va cho đe cho ta ranh tay
